dialogue.name: Ms Shimizu
dialogue.dialogueText: And remember class, golden week starts next week. Now it may be a holiday, but that doesn’t mean you can all slack on your studies.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Golden week? Ah I forgot that was starting next week.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: It is unsurprising all things considered that I forgot. When you have people demanding your time and attention every moment of every day...well you barely have time to remember the smaller things in life.

dialogue.name: Ms Shimizu
dialogue.dialogueText: Oh and definitely remember not to do anything dangerous okay? I want to see all of you come back to class after next week.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Don't do anything dangerous? Well outside of dealing with demons, robots from the future and the odd alien...I don't think my life could get anymore dangerous actually...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Either way, it doesn’t matter. The only thing I want during this week off is a break from the usual craziness that is dealing with the people in my life.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: My eyes drift outside to the window and right on cue is another strange-looking person. I remember seeing him earlier in the year. He is a pretty-boy with longish blonde hair, deep blue eyes, but his most notable feature is that he is riding a horse.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Why was he allowed to bring a horse to school?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: These situations keep getting stupider...Maybe if I don’t make eye contact with him he will leave me alone? Yeah right, has that ever worked?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I stared down at the horse-riding man as I pondered how to avoid his company. I mean I know he will most likely force his way into my life. I am curious as to how this will play out exactly.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: In the window? Oh he means me...well of course he does.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I felt my hand start to itch. So that definitely means that he is another one of those weirdos dragged her by the curse...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I must've been lost in thought because I felt myself snap back to reality as I heard his voice. I turned to face him and found the man standing in the window. How did he get up here so fast!? Isn’t this the second floor?

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: Haha! I can see you are surprised at my sudden appearance! Every gentleman must know how to valiantly climb a wall or two in order to save a beautiful damsel.
